name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPT Breeze - ChatGPT shortcuts on your current tab & Youtube summarizer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize Youtube videos and any content on the web. Use ChatGPT, Claude, and Bing Copilot in your current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GPT Breeze‚Äîyour AI-powered sidekick designed to supercharge your browsing experience and make every minute you spend online count. ‚è±Ô∏è üëÄ

Key Features that will make you fall in love with GPT Breeze:

**‚ö° Productivity Enhancements That Actually Work*
‚Ä¢ Select any text to instantly explain, translate, summarize, or enhance your writing. It's like having a personal assistant right in your browser.
‚Ä¢ Summarize and chat with page content. 
‚Ä¢ For the power users out there, create custom AI tools (prompts) for those recurring tasks that eat up your time. (Premium feature)

**üé• YouTube Video Summarization - Because Life's Too Short for Clickbait**
‚Ä¢ Generate time-stamped summaries that let you navigate long videos effortlessly. 
‚Ä¢ Summarize videos directly on the YouTube home screen or search results page to combat clickbait

**üí∏ Pricing That Respects Your Wallet**
‚Ä¢ Free tier available with most features. Because we believe in try-before-you-buy.
‚Ä¢ Upgrade to Premium with ONE TIME PURCHASE to unlock the full potential with custom AI shortcuts (prompts) and workflow customization.
‚Ä¢ Bring Your Own API Key for cost-effective, pay-as-you-go usage. In most cases, it's much cheaper than a ChatGPT subscription. Now that's smart economics!

**üß† Select your preferred AI models**
‚Ä¢ Seamlessly use ChatGPT-4, Claude 3.5, and Bing Copilot in any tab. It's like having a team of AI experts at your fingertips.
‚Ä¢ Our chat popup opens within your current tab, minimizing disruptions. Because your workflow shouldn't feel like a game of whack-a-mole.

**üîê Privacy & Data Security - Because Your Data is Yours**
GPT Breeze takes your privacy seriously. We don't store any of your data or conversations on our servers. Once installed, GPT Breeze operates exclusively on your computer. No account creation necessary - it's that simple.

For the most stable and efficient experience, we recommend entering an OpenAI API key in order to GPT Breeze (we'll guide you through this process during onboarding).. 

üì™ Questions? Feedback? We're all ears! Drop us a line at yourfriend@gptbreeze.io

**‚õµ Recent Updates - Because We're Always Improving:**
1.1.6 (2024-12-15) Happy Xmas üéÑ
- Fully customize your AI shortcuts for page content, selected text and Youtube videos. 

1.1.5 (2024-12-01) 
- Thanks for your feedback, now you can add page context to the conversation card. Yay!
- Huge: AI shortcuts (summarization) for Youtube videos can be used on Home Screen, Search Result and Watch Later page.
- Life quality update: Press Escape to close the conversation cards on the page.

1.1.4 (2024-11-05)

- Added the ability to create custom AI shortcuts (prompts) for YouTube transcripts. The beauty of this feature? You can now tailor your video insights exactly how you want them.

1.1.3 (2024-10-25)

- Fixed some stability issues. The extension is now more stable than ever, with fewer errors that you can notice. We're always working to make your experience smoother.

1.1.1 (2024-10-19)

- Not only can you summarize a YouTube video, but now you can also extract key insights from it. It's like having a personal video analyst!
- Click on 'summarize page' on the side toolbar to get a video summary with timestamps.

1.1.0 (2024-10-05)

- Premium features: Save your custom AI tools (prompts), enjoy a dedicated chat panel, and manage your chat history.

1.0.8 (2024-09-26)

- We heard you: Now you can hide the Breeze icon on the right side, or get rid of it altogether (in the extension options). Your browser, your rules.
- Exciting new feature: Write your custom prompt on selected text. The power of AI, tailored to your exact needs.
